mapper.select: select sto_num,main_ads_img from (select a.*, rownum rnum from (select * from main_ads_entry where to_char(main_ads_start,'yyyy-mm')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm') order by main_ads_price desc)a) where rnum<=3
select * from (select a.*, rownum rnum from (select * from main_ads_entry where to_char(main_ads_start,'yyyy-mm')=to_char(#{main_ads_start},'yyyy-mm'))a) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from main_ads_entry where to_char(main_ads_start,'yyyy-mm') = to_char(#{value},'yyyy-mm')
